title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info
author: oeyoews
name: neotw-info
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/readme","description":"neotw-info"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/data.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/data.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/data.js type: application/javascript module-type: library data \*/ module.exports=()=>{const t=t=>$tw.wiki.filterTiddlers(t);return{blockClass:"flex items-center rounded-full bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 px-2 py-1",update:t("[!is[system]!prefix[$:/]!has[draft.of]!sort[modified]limit[1]get[modified]format:relativedate[]]")[0],plugins:t("[plugin-type[plugin]]").length,tags:t("[tags[]]").length,tiddlers:t("[!is[system]]").length.toLocaleString(),version:$tw.version.replace(/-/g," "),textClass:"ml-2 text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400"}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/template.ejs":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/template.ejs","text":"<%# 以下内容是v0.dev根据旧版的neotw-info ui 重构而来, 根据 ejs 需要做了少量更改 link: https://v0.dev/r/jLkrqzcE3ff %>
Version <%= version %>
Update <%= update %>
Plugins <%= plugins %>
Tags <%= tags %>
Tiddlers <%= tiddlers %>
","type":"text/plain"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/widget.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/widget.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/widget.js type: application/javascript module-type: widget neotw-info widget \*/ const{widget:e}=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js");exports.oinfo=class extends e{constructor(e,t){super(e,t)}render(e,t){if(!$tw.browser)return;this.computeAttributes(),this.execute();const r=require("./data")(),s=require("ejs.min.js"),i=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText("$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-info/template.ejs"),o=s.render(i,r),n=this.document.createElement("div");n.innerHTML=o,e.insertBefore(n,t),this.domNodes.push(n)}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"}}}
